reviewText: My wife is a K-3 teacher, and has used this over and over in schools. Kids love it and learn about instruments and music. Great introduction to music appreciation. Great for kids age 4-5 up to 10-12.

My son loved to watch these tapes. It is a wonderful overview of music and different types of instruments. He can listen to songs and pick out the different instruments. It teaches about a variety of musical styles. They are divided into lessons but if I was busy he would watch for as long as possible. Great for preschool-first grade.
